name: Game Chips
keywords: appetizer, side dish, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dried herbs, potato
recipeIngredient: 12 medium baking potatoes, peeled and sliced 1/16 inch thick, submerged in cold water

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a heavy skillet to 360 degrees or until the oil begins to ripple on the surface.
When ready, drain the potatoes and pat thoroughly dry.
Place approximately a half cup of potatoes at a time into hot oil. Fry for two to three minutes, or until golden.
Remove the potatoes from the oil with a slotted spoon and drain in a single layer on a paper bag.
